title: Monaco Theme Schema
description: A JSON schema for defining Monaco themes.

base.description: A theme to base your theme off of (e.g. vs, vs-dark, or hc-black).
base.title: Base Theme

inherit.description: Determines if it will completely replace the built-in rules.
inherit.title: Inherit Built-in Rules

colors.description: The colors that are used by the theme.
colors.title: Colors

additionalProperties.title: Color
additionalProperties.description: A color value for the specified key.

rules.description: An array of rules that define how different types of tokens are displayed.
rules.title: Rules

foreground.description: The foreground color of the token.
foreground.title: Foreground Color

fontStyle.description: The font style of the token.
fontStyle.title: Font Style

background.description: The background color of the token.
background.title: Background Color
